emuInput.TitMainTitle: Centre Avenue YMCA basketball team with Samuel Barber, James Covington, Rudy Riley, James Atkins, Robert Branch, Pat Wade, Craig Copeland, Ray Gloster, Harry Lawrence, Donald Myers, physical education director Walter Crocker, and coach Merman Austin, posed in Y formation in gymnasium
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 17, 1955, pg. 30, reads: "'Y' Big Five - The powerful Centre Avenue 'Y' Big Five meets the McKeesport 'Y,' winners in the County League last season, at the Centre Avenue 'Y,' Friday night at 8:30.  A 7:30 preliminary pits the Olympic Trotters against the McKeesport Jayvees.  Players listed are Samuel Barber, James Covington, Rudy Riley, James Atkins, Robert Branch, Pat Wade, Craig Copeland, Ray Gloster, Harry Lawrence and Donald Myers.  Rear center (in street clothes) left to right, are Walter Crocker, 'Y' physical education director; Myers and Merman Austin, coach. - Harris Photo."
